text:
#COVID19: Before the #vaccines get to you, please #staysafe.

Globally, as of 18 April 2021, there have been 140,322,903 confirmed cases, including 3,003,794 deaths. 

As of 19 April 2021, 792,796,083 #vaccine doses have been administered.

@WHO #MondayMotivation @LLopezGonzalez https://t.co/fdMbMSnnma
